title: Unfolded Formulation of 4d Yang-Mills Theory
abstract:
In this note we construct a formulation of 4d pure Yang-Mills theory in the
unfolded language of higher-spin gravity. It represents a first-order
formulation possessing manifest diffeomorphism- and gauge-invariance. We make
use of an unfolding method that was recently put forward and used to unfold
scalar electrodynamics. We also discuss features of various unfolding maps
defined by the unfolded equations.
